hero.description: SETAL connects citizens with municipalities to solve urban waste problems. Report issues instantly, track progress in real-time, and watch your community transform.
hero.imageAlt: Citizen reporting and municipal team resolving waste issues
hero.title: Clean Cities Start Here
hero.subtitle: Report waste, track cleanup, and make your city cleaner with SETAL

citizenFeatures.subtitle: Your voice matters. SETAL gives you the tools to make a real difference in your neighborhood.

snapReport.title: Snap & Report in Seconds
snapReport.description: Take a photo, add a brief description, and submit. And categorize your report.
snapReport.longDescription: Our intuitive interface makes reporting issues effortless. Simply capture the problem with your phone's camera, add relevant details, select the appropriate category, and submit. The entire process takes less than a minute, ensuring you can quickly report issues without disrupting your day.

realTimeTracking.title: Real-time Tracking
realTimeTracking.description: Follow your report's journey from submission to resolution with live status updates.
realTimeTracking.longDescription: Stay informed every step of the way with our real-time tracking system. Receive instant notifications when your report is acknowledged, assigned to a team, being worked on, and finally resolved. You'll never wonder about the status of your submission again.

impactMap.title: City Impact Map
impactMap.description: Visualize all resolved issues in your area. See the collective impact of citizen participation.
impactMap.longDescription: Explore an interactive map showcasing all resolved issues in your neighborhood and across the city. Watch as your community transforms over time, and see the tangible results of civic engagement. The map provides insights into problem areas and improvements in real-time.

communityTogether.title: Community Together
communityTogether.description: Join neighbors in improving your district. Celebrate wins and see your community transform.
communityTogether.longDescription: Connect with fellow residents who care about your neighborhood. See what others are reporting, support their submissions, and collaborate on community improvements. Together, we create stronger, more responsive communities.

liveStatus.title: Live Status Monitoring
liveStatus.description: Municipalities can monitor every report's status in real time, track progress, and ensure issues are resolved efficiently.
liveStatus.longDescription: Municipal teams have access to powerful dashboards that display all incoming reports, assign tasks to relevant departments, track resolution times, and analyze trends. This ensures accountability and helps prioritize resources where they're needed most.

privacyProtected.title: Privacy Protected
privacyProtected.description: Your personal data stays safe. Report anonymously if you prefer.
privacyProtected.longDescription: We take your privacy seriously. All reports are encrypted, and you have full control over what information you share. Choose to report anonymously or include contact details for follow-up. Your data is never sold or shared with third parties.

citizenFeatures.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

howItWorks.subtitle: From spotting an issue to seeing it resolved â€“ the entire process is transparent and efficient.

step1.title: Snap & Report
step1.description: See waste or an urban issue? Take a photo, select a category, and submit in seconds. Your location is automatically captured.

step2.title: Real-time Monitoring
step2.description: Your report is categorized and instantly sent to the right municipal team.

step3.title: Issue Resolved
step3.description: The team takes action and you get notified. See before & after photos and rate the resolution.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple steps to make a difference

impactStats.subtitle: Together, citizens and municipalities are transforming urban environments across the globe.

municipality.title: For Municipalities
municipality.subtitle: Powerful tools to manage waste efficiently

municipalityDashboard.subtitle: SETAL provides municipalities with powerful tools to manage citizen reports, optimize team workflows, and deliver measurable improvements in city cleanliness.

centralized.title: Centralized Management
centralized.description: All citizen reports in one unified dashboard. Filter, search, and manage with ease.

teamAssignment.title: Team Assignment
teamAssignment.description: Route issues to the right teams automatically. Track workload and optimize resources.

analytics.title: Performance Analytics
analytics.description: Measure response times, resolution rates, and citizen satisfaction in real-time.

slaTracking.title: SLA Tracking
slaTracking.description: Set and monitor service level agreements. Never miss a deadline again.

beforeAfter.subtitle: Slide to see how SETAL helps communities reclaim their spaces.

citizen.quote: I reported an illegal dump site and it was cleaned up within 24 hours. Amazing!
citizen.author: Maria S.

director.quote: SETAL helped us reduce response times by 60% and improve citizen satisfaction scores dramatically.
director.author: James Chen

beforeAfter.title: See the Difference
beforeAfter.subtitle: Real transformations in our communities
